name: Cats VS Dogs Pro
description:
Long long ago, maybe just when human starts to keep animals, cat and dog is the enemy for each other, the reason?

Cat said: Human gives me the food, the water and the house, he also takes good care of me, I am the God.

That is to say, the faith of cat - I am the God.

Dog said: Human gives me the food, the water and the house, he also takes good care of me, he is the God.

That is to say, the faith of dog - Human is the God.

So, the different faiths cause the opposition.

They tried to prove the correct of their faith by defeating the other, can they succeed?

This is just the stroy we are about to tell- Cats & Dogs
